p: One hundred grams of dried leaves of L. nobilis were ground in a Waring blender and then subjected to hydrodistillation for 3 h according to the standard procedure described in the European Pharmacopoeia [ 36]. The yellow essential oil was solubilized in n-hexane, filtered over anhydrous sodium sulphate, and stored under N 2 at +4 Â°C in the dark, until tested and analyzed.
